snippet.title: BREAKING: Football Manager 2018 Headline Feature News!
snippet.description:
Rumours have surfaced regarding some of the new features which are set to be included in Football Manager 2018. News channel Global 24/7 separates the fake news from the truth to reveal some exciting developments for FM18.

Pre-Purchase FM18 on Steam: https://2018.fm/2ftTK1B
Got FM17? Grab yourself a 25% discount on FM18: https://2018.fm/2xO1h5P

Football Manager 2018 will be released on November 10th. Be sure to Subscribe to the Football Manager YouTube channel for more feature announcements in the upcoming weeks. Subscribe now: https://2018.fm/2xCaXki

The Football Manager 2018 rumours discussed in this video are: scouting, improved stadium design, sports scientists, Fantasy Draft and dynamics.

Follow the Football Manager Social links 
Facebook: https://2018.fm/2wZSuK6
Twitter: https://2018.fm/2fBWSMu
Instagram: https://2018.fm/2xOSUX

“This Moment”
Performed by Chase + Status + Blossoms
Written by Kennard, Milton and Ogden
Published by Universal Music Publishing Ltd & BMG Rights Management Ltd © 2017
Courtesy of Virgin EMI Records Ltd
Under licence from Universal Music Operations Limited
